languages.text: {n}Глаза змея злобно сверкают.{/n} "Именно ее. Я подумал, что еще не закончил с этим куском мяса, и пришил ее назад. Вышло... неидеально. С другой стороны, ваша раса изначально довольно ущербна, и пара недостатков вроде безумия и регулярных попыток захлебнуться собственной кровью не так уж и заметна".

traits.locale_text: {n}Глаза змея злобно сверкают.{/n} "Именно ее. Я подумал, что еще не закончил с этим куском мяса, и пришил ее назад. Вышло... неидеально. С другой стороны, ваша раса изначально довольно ущербна, и пара недостатков вроде безумия и регулярных попыток захлебнуться собственной кровью не так уж и заметна".
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}The snake's eyes glitter malevolently.{/n} "You did. I realised I wasn't finished with this lump of meat, so I stitched it back on. The result was... imperfect. Then again, your race are defective to begin with, so a few more flaws like madness and regular attempts to drink your own blood aren't very noticeable."

languages.text: {n}蛇人的双眼闪烁着恶毒的光芒。{/n}“确实是，但我随后意识到，我和这只活畜之间的这笔账还没算完，于是我就又把它缝了起来。结果……并不完美，但话说回来，你的种族从出生就带着缺陷，所以再多些缺陷也不会有人注意，比如会发疯，或是总是打算喝自己的血之类的。”
languages.original_text: {n}The snake's eyes glitter malevolently.{/n} "You did. I realised I wasn't finished with this lump of meat, so I stitched it back on. The result was... imperfect. Then again, your race are defective to begin with, so a few more flaws like madness and regular attempts to drink your own blood aren't very noticeable."

traits.locale_text: {n}蛇人的双眼闪烁着恶毒的光芒。{/n}“确实是，但我随后意识到，我和这块肉之间的这笔账还没算完，于是我就又把它缝了起来。结果……并不完美，但话说回来，你的种族从出生就带着缺陷，所以再多些缺陷也不会有人注意，比如会发疯，或是总是打算喝自己的血之类的。”
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}Los ojos de la serpiente brillan con maldad.{/n} «Sí, así es. Me di cuenta de que no había terminado con este trozo de carne y volví a cosérselo. El resultado es... imperfecto. Pero bueno, tu especie es imperfecta por naturaleza así que tampoco se notan unos pocos defectos más como la locura y los intentos regulares de beber tu propia sangre».
languages.original_text: {n}The snake's eyes glitter malevolently.{/n} "You did. I realised I wasn't finished with this lump of meat, so I stitched it back on. The result was... imperfect. Then again, your race are defective to begin with, so a few more flaws like madness and regular attempts to drink your own blood aren't very noticeable."

Pero bueno, tu especie es imperfecta por naturaleza así que tampoco se notan unos pocos defectos más como la locura y los intentos regulares de beber tu propia sangre».
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}蛇の目が邪悪さを帯びた。{/n}「ああ。まだこの肉塊に用事があったので縫い合わせることにした。完璧な仕上がりとは言えないが…貴様の種は元々欠陥が覆いから、狂気や自分の血を飲みたがるといった傾向も大した問題ではない」
languages.original_text: {n}The snake's eyes glitter malevolently.{/n} "You did. I realised I wasn't finished with this lump of meat, so I stitched it back on. The result was... imperfect. Then again, your race are defective to begin with, so a few more flaws like madness and regular attempts to drink your own blood aren't very noticeable."

traits.locale_text: {n}蛇の目が邪悪さを帯びた。{/n}「ああ。まだこの肉塊に用事があったので縫い合わせることにした。完璧な仕上がりとは言えないが…貴様の種は元々欠陥が覆いから、狂気や自分の血を飲みたがるといった傾向も大した問題ではない」
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}Die Augen der Schlange blitzen boshaft auf.{/n} "Das habt Ihr. Mir ist klargeworden, dass ich mit diesem Klumpen Fleisch noch nicht durch war, also habe ich ihn wieder angenäht. Das Ergebnis war ... nicht ganz perfekt. Andererseits ist Euer Volk ohnehin voller Makel. Ein paar mehr fallen da kaum ins Gewicht — beispielsweise völliger Wahnsinn oder regelmäßige Versuche, das eigene Blut zu trinken."
languages.original_text: {n}The snake's eyes glitter malevolently.{/n} "You did. I realised I wasn't finished with this lump of meat, so I stitched it back on. The result was... imperfect. Then again, your race are defective to begin with, so a few more flaws like madness and regular attempts to drink your own blood aren't very noticeable."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Augen der Schlange blitzen boshaft auf.{/n} "Das habt Ihr. Mir ist klargeworden, dass ich mit diesem Klumpen Fleisch noch nicht durch war, also habe ich ihn wieder angenäht. Das Ergebnis war ... nicht ganz perfekt. Andererseits ist Euer Volk ohnehin voller Makel. Ein paar mehr fallen da kaum ins Gewicht — beispielsweise völliger Wahnsinn oder regelmäßige Versuche, das eigene Blut zu trinken."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}Une lueur cruelle fait briller les yeux du serpent.{/n} « En effet. Et puis je me suis rendu compte que je n'en avais pas fini avec ce morceau de viande, alors je l'ai rafistolé. Le résultat... laissait à désirer. Mais il faut dire que votre espèce est naturellement imparfaite, alors qui remarquerait une poignée de défauts en plus ? Comme la folie, ou l'envie régulière de boire votre propre sang... »
languages.original_text: {n}The snake's eyes glitter malevolently.{/n} "You did. I realised I wasn't finished with this lump of meat, so I stitched it back on. The result was... imperfect. Then again, your race are defective to begin with, so a few more flaws like madness and regular attempts to drink your own blood aren't very noticeable."

traits.locale_text: {n}Une lueur cruelle fait briller les yeux du serpent.{/n} « En effet. Et puis je me suis rendu compte que je n'en avais pas fini avec ce morceau de viande, alors je l'ai rafistolé. Le résultat... laissait à désirer. Mais il faut dire que votre espèce est naturellement imparfaite, alors qui remarquerait une poignée de défauts en plus ? Comme la folie, ou l'envie régulière de boire votre propre sang... »
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}Yılanın gözlerinden kindarlık yansıyor.{/n} "Getirdin. Bu et yığınıyla işimin bitmediğini anlayınca kellesini geri diktim. Netice... Kusursuz olmadı. Gerçi ırkınız zaten kusurlu, delilik yahut kendi kanını içme çabaları gibi bozukluklar eklenince pek de göze batmıyor."
languages.original_text: {n}The snake's eyes glitter malevolently.{/n} "You did. I realised I wasn't finished with this lump of meat, so I stitched it back on. The result was... imperfect. Then again, your race are defective to begin with, so a few more flaws like madness and regular attempts to drink your own blood aren't very noticeable."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yılanın gözlerinden kindarlık yansıyor.{/n} "Getirdin. Bu et yığınıyla işimin bitmediğini anlayınca kellesini geri diktim. Netice... kusursuz olmadı. Gerçi ırkınız zaten kusurlu olduğu için delilik yahut kendi kanını içme çabaları bu bozukluklara eklenince pek de göze batmıyor."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger
